newsitem.title: FINLAND: FORECAST- Wide range for Sampo H1 profit.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST- Wide range for Sampo H1 profit.

text.p: A Reuters survey of eight analysts covering Finnish equities showed a 325 million markka mean forecast in a wide range for insurer Vakuutusosakeyhtio Sampo's first-half operating profit.

The results are due on Wednesday, August 28 at 1000 local time (0700 GMT). The comparable first half 1995 operating profit figure was not reported last year but a Sampo spokesman said its was 383 million markka.
At end-March 1996, Sampo's CEO Jouko Leskinen said Sampo assumed its operating profit would improve in 1996. Sampo's 1995 full-year operating profit was 319 million markka.
Six of the seven analysts polled by Reuters forecast Sampo's full-year 1996 operating profit at 397 million markka on average (range 339-480 million). @
Contributing to the survey were Carnegie, Enskilda, Erik Selin, Merita, Opstock, Postipankki and Svenska Handelsbanken.
